text: And the woman went in to all the people, and she spoke to all the city in her wisdom; and 20. 22 Gr. it or she. i. e. ἡ πόλις.they took off the head of Sabee the son of Bochori; and took it away and threw it to Joab: and he blew the trumpet, and the people separated from the city away from him, every man to his tent: and Joab returned to Jerusalem to the king.
